title: Aim: Getting an S in invasion. RECRUITING!!!  ~ oce
body:
If you're good at sidestepping and waveclearing / kiting then we need you.

Recruiting we don't have any players right now but type your user (rank doesn't matter just mechanics)  and we should easily get an S if we strategise

replies.body: i've played onslaught many times know lots of the spawns and veru experienced add me Tommo123
Im up for it. pretty experienced just need a confident team behind me to guarantee an S. ign: i ate a pinecone
Hey man, need to get these missions and shit out of the way asap. Summoner is Al Kane
